A Guide For Junior Developers

I recently wrote a post on Medium: The Seven Habits of a Highly Effective Junior Developer.

Here are the bullet points:

  1. Learn Voraciously

  2. Ask Great Questions

  3. Clean Code Matters

  4. Fail Often — Fail Well

  5. Tackle Bite-size Problems

  6. Build Things

  7. Soft Skills Matter

Give the whole thing a read if you’re into that sort of thing!
